items.sentence: Tom is fortunate that the storm didn't damage his house.
I put honey on my peanut butter sandwich instead of jam.
I'm too busy right now to do that. Could we do it later?
Tom and Mary are both much thinner than they used to be.
Tom and Mary would both really like to go to your party.
My grandpa blew out all 97 candles on his birthday cake.
It's depressing that all we can do is sit here and wait.
Tom didn't speak French until he was thirteen years old.
There was lavender in bloom as far as the eye could see.
The shop on the corner sells fruit at a very good price.
